about.summary: A unified algorithm, blockwise-majorization-descent (BMD), for efficiently computing the solution paths of the group-lasso penalized least squares, logistic regression, Huberized SVM and squared SVM. The package is an implementation of Yang, Y. and Zou, H. (2015) DOI: <doi:10.1007/s11222-014-9498-5>.

name: r-gglasso
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gglasso
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/gglasso_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/gglasso/gglasso_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a460e80d926eabdd327f54823e80f5cd28d4221e9cff1d78242020ede7739f64

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1002
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}  # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}        # [win]
    - {{posix}}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{posix}}make
    - {{posix}}sed               # [win]
    - {{posix}}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{native}}gcc-libs         # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('gglasso')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('gglasso')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/emeryyi/gglasso
  license: GPL-2
  summary: 'A unified algorithm, blockwise-majorization-descent (BMD), for efficiently computing
    the solution paths of the group-lasso penalized least squares, logistic regression,
    Huberized SVM and squared SVM. The package is an implementation of Yang, Y. and
    Zou, H. (2015) DOI: <doi:10.1007/s11222-014-9498-5>.'
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
    - jdblischak
    - cbrueffer
    - dbast
